video_prompt: The video is a cartoon-style video of a young girl drawing a portrait of herself in a sketchbook. The sketch girl is the main character in the video, and she is the only character present in the video. She is holding a pencil in her hand and is focused on her drawing. The background is a plain white background. There is a sketchbook and a pencil on the left side of the screen. The camera is stationary and the focus is on the sketch girl and her drawing.

speech_prompt.speaker: the girl
speech_prompt.text: Infinite possibilities. But first of all, you need inspiration.
